citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written environment enhancement plan for birds (emus) at the time of inspection. Dealers,
exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment
enhancement adequate to promote the physical and psychological well-being of birds. The plan, at a minimum, must
address each of the following: social grouping, environmental enrichment, and special considerations. The plan must be
approved by the attending veterinarian and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently
accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides. This plan must be
made available to APHIS upon request.
To be corrected by: 26-August-2024
This inspection was conducted at the Bremer County Fair in Waverly, Iowa.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have a written environment enhancement plan for birds (emus) at the time of inspection. Dealers, 
exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment 
enhancement adequate to promote the physical and psychological well-being of birds. The plan, at a minimum, must 
address each of the following: social grouping, environmental enrichment, and special considerations. The plan must be 
approved by the attending veterinarian and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently 
accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides. This plan must be 
made available to APHIS upon request. 
To be corrected by: 26-August-2024 
 
This inspection was conducted at the Bremer County Fair in Waverly, Iowa. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
